children.label: In case of one storey Width of foundation: for soft soil >= 650 mm, for medium soil>=550 mm and for hard soil>=550mm or In case of two storey Width of foundation: for soft soil >= 900 mm, for medium soil>=650 mm and for hard soil>=550mm

children.label: Diameter of Steel Used in First Floor (in mm)

children.label: Diameter of Steel Used in Adjacent to Window (in mm)

children.label: If Provided, For Wood/ Bamboo Reinforcement

children.label: Size of Wood Used for Wall Corner and Junction (in mm)

children.label: Size of Bamboo Used for Wall Corner and Junction (in mm)

children.label: Size of Wood Used for Adjacent Door and Windows (in mm)

children.name: c_l_v_r_str_fnd
children.label: The reinforcement is started from foundation.

children.name: c_l_v_r_size
children.label: At corners and junctions vertical reinforcing bar provided is 12mm for one storey or 16 mm for two storey building. At jambs, the reinforcing bars also 12mm. OR For Wood 75mm * 100mm for joints, wall corners and adjacent to all doors and windows OR For Bamboo the size of vertical bamboo reinforcement be more than 80mm in diameter having thickness of at least 10mm

children.name: c_l_v_r_laping
children.label: The reinforcement bar lapping be at least 60 times the diameter of biggest bar.

children.name: c_l_v_r_laping_bmc
children.label: The vertical steel bar reinforcement are used in adjacent to door, windows and wall corners

children.name: pl_bnd_no
children.label: Number of Reinforcement Bar Used (in mm)

children.name: pl_bnd_dia
children.label: Diameter of Reinforcement Bar Used (in mm)

children.name: pl_bnd_strp_dia
children.label: Diameter of Stirrups Bar Used (in mm)

children.name: pl_band_size_w
children.label: Size of Wood Used (in mm * mm / Dia. mm)

children.name: pl_band_size_w_b_strp
children.label: Size of Strip Used(in mm * mm and @ C/C mm)

children.name: c_l_p_b_thk
children.label: A continuous plinth band is provided through all walls at the plinth level. The minimum thickness is 75mm for hard soil. In case of soft soil, band is 150mm thick OR For Wood strip size of 2 - 75mm * 38mm with batten of 50mm * 30mm @500mm c/c.

children.name: c_l_p_b_rein
children.label: The 2-12 reinforcement bar in 75 mm thickness and 4-12 bars in 150mm thick plinth band is provided. Use of 6mm dia. Stirrups at 150mm centers. The concrete cover is 25 mm.

children.name: c_l_p_b_wdh
children.label: The width of plinth band is not be less than 350 mm or width of foundation wall with least dimension of 230 mm for BMC

children.name: avb_pl_lvl_lst_dm
children.label: The Least Dimension of Opening from Inside Corner (in M)

children.name: avb_pl_lvl_lst_dm_bwtn
children.label: The Least Distance between two Openings in Line Wall (in M)

children.name: c_l_interlock_wll
children.label: The walls are interlocked and laid staggered. At corners or wall junctions, continuous vertical joints is avoided by properly laying large stones. The wall is interlocked. Also vertical as of plumb.

children.name: c_l_mrtar_wll
children.label: Average mortar joints are not more than 20 mm and less than 10 mm in thickness.

children.name: c_l_spcng_wll
children.label: Spacing of through stone is more than 1200 mm in the horizontal direction and 600 mm in vertical direction.

children.name: c_l_thck_wll
children.label: The wall thickness is not less or more than 350 – 450 mm for one storey houses

children.name: c_l_thck_wll_bmm
children.label: The wall thickness is at least 350 mm

children.name: c_l_thck_wll_p_g
children.label: The wall thickness is either 230 mm or 110 mm

children.name: c_l_thck_wll_bmc
children.label: The wall thickness is at least 230 mm for one storey or 350mm at GF and 230mm in FF for two storey

children.name: c_l_ht_wll_btn_smm
children.label: The height of wall between floors is not more than 8 times wall thickness or is maximum room height is 3 M.

children.name: c_l_ht_wll_btn_smc
children.label: The very long wall is supported horizantly

children.name: c_l_gabl_wll_smc
children.label: The light materials are used in gable wall

children.name: av_p_l_opng_crnr
children.label: Openings are to be located away from inside corners by ¼ of the height of the adjoining opening, but not less than 600 mm.

children.name: av_p_l_opng_lngth
children.label: Total length of opening is less than 0.3 of individual wall length.

children.name: av_p_l_opng_lngth_smc
children.label: Total length of opening is 50% of length of individual wall for one storey and 42% for two storey..

children.name: av_p_l_opng_lngth_bmm
children.label: Total length of opening is 30% of length of individual wall length.

children.name: av_p_l_opng_dstn
children.label: Distance between the two openings is larger of half the height of shorter opening or 600 mm.

children.name: av_p_l_opng_lntl
children.label: Keep lintel level same for doors and windows.

children.name: s_bnd_no_br
children.label: Number of Reinforcement Bar Used (in mm)

children.name: s_bnd_dia_br
children.label: Diameter of Reinforcement Bar Used (in mm)

children.name: s_bnd_stri_dia
children.label: Diameter of Stirrups Bar Used (in mm)

children.name: s_bnd_sz_w
children.label: Size of Wood/Bamboo Used (in mm * mm / Dia. mm)

children.name: s_bnd_sz_b
children.label: Size of Bamboo Used (in mm * mm / Dia. mm)

children.name: s_bnd_sz_w_b_strp
children.label: Size of Strip Used(@ C/C mm)

children.name: s_bnd_c_l_thk
children.label: A continuous sill band is provided through all walls at the bottom levels of opening. The minimum thickness is 75mm. OR For Wood strip size of 2 - 75mm * 38mm with batten of 50mm * 30mm @500mm c/c.

children.name: s_bnd_c_l_reinfrm
children.label: The 2-12 reinforcement bar in 75 mm thickness and 4-12 bars in 150mm sill plinth band is provided. Use of 6mm dia. Stirrups at 150mm centers. The concrete cover shall be 25 mm.

children.name: s_bnd_c_l_lapg
children.label: The lapping of reinforcement is 60 times the biggest dia. bar.

children.name: gbl_bnd_c_l_thck

It is recommended to replace gable masonry wall with light-weight materials such as metal sheet or timber. OR For Wood strip size of 2 - 75mm * 100mm with strip 50mm * 38mm @500mm c/c.

children.name: info_man_who
children.label: सूचना दिने व्यक्ति घरधनी हो वा परिवारको सदस्य हो ?

children.name: info_man_rltn
children.label: परिवारको सदस्य भए घरधनीसंगको नाता खुलाउनहोस ।

choices.label: वैशाख १२ को भुकम्प अघि वनेको र हाल प्रयोगमा रहेको

भूकम्पले पृर्ण क्षति भई पुनर्निमाण गरिएको

children.label: हाल निर्माणाधिण भएमा घरधनीको घर वनाउनुको उदेश्य के रहेको छ ?

children.name: sbsdy_tke
children.label: पुनर्निमाणमा सरकारवाट अनुदान प्राप्त गरेको नगरेको

children.name: mason_invl_001
children.label: घर निर्माणमा संलग्न डकर्मीको विवरण (एक जना भन्दा वदी भए सो पनि खुलाउनु होला ।)

children.name: mason_invl_no_trnd_nt
children.hint: (दैनिक सरदर काममा रहने संख्या उल्लेख गर्ने)
children.label: तालिम प्राप्त नगरेको डकर्मीको संख्या

children.name: mason_invl_no
children.label: घर निर्माणमा संलग्न जम्मा डकर्मीको संख्या

children.name: rpt_mason_det
children.label: डकर्मीको विवरण (कृपया टयाव प्रयोग गरि सर्भे गर्दा व्याक स्वाईप गरी डकर्मीको संख्या संशोधन गरी घटाउनु पर्ने भएमा, फर्वाड स्वाइप गर्दा पुरानो घटेको संख्या अनुरुप विवरणको लागी, सो घटेको बिबरणहरुमा "edited" टाईप गरिदिनु होला ।)

children.name: mason_dtel_cell

children.label: मोवाईल नं:

children.name: mason_dtel_eq_t
children.label: भूकम्प प्रतिरोधी घर निर्माण प्रविधि तालिम प्राप्त डकर्मी हो वा होईन ?

children.label: तालिम प्राप्त डकर्मी भए NSET वाट तालिम प्राप्त वा अन्य वाट हो ?

children.name: constrct_cst
children.hint: (सरकारवाट अनुदान प्राप्त गरेको भए सो वाहेक)
children.label: घर वनाउदा लागेको लागत वा घर वनाउनको लागी लगानी गर्न चाहेको लागत

children.name: msn_daily_wge_trn
children.label: तालिम प्राप्त डकर्मीलाई घर वनाउदा दिएको दैनिक ज्याला प्रतिदिन (रु)

children.hint: (तालिम प्राप्त नगरेको डकर्मी)
children.label: सामान्य डकर्मीलाई घर वनाउदा दिएको दैनिक ज्याला प्रतिदिन (रु)

children.name: tech_assist
children.label: घर वनाउन प्राविधिक सल्लाह लिएको छ, छैन ।

children.name: tech_assist_y
children.label: प्राविधिक सहायता लिएको भए कसवाट लिएको हो सो खुलाउनु होला ।

children.name: no_ho_hina_tchna
children.label: घर वनाउदा वरीपरि वा कसैले वनाएको घरवाट प्रभावित भई सो वमोजिम घर वनाउन लागेको वा वनाएको हो होईन ।

children.name: tkn_nxt_hme
children.label: यदी हो भने के घरको कुन कुन पक्षलाई अन्य वाट ग्रहण गरेको छ ।

children.name: ner_eq_huse
children.label: वनेको घर वा घर निर्माणस्थल वरिपरी भूकम्प प्रतिरोधी घर निर्माण भएको, नभएको थाहा छ वा छैन ।

children.name: ner_eq_huse_tme
children.hint: (पैदल हिडेर पुगिने समय उल्लेख गर्नु होला)
children.label: यदी थाहा छ भने घर वा घर निर्माणस्थलवाट कति दूरीमा रहेको छ।

children.name: awrns_parti
children.label: भूकम्प प्रतिरोधी घर निर्माण सम्वन्धी कुनै कार्यक्रममा भाग लिएको छ, छैन ?

children.name: awr_par_prd
children.label: भूकम्प प्रतिरोधी घर निर्माण सम्वन्धी कुनै कार्यक्रममा भाग लिएको छ भने कति पहिले लिएको हो ?

children.name: awrns_media
children.label: भूकम्प प्रतिरोधी घर निर्माण सम्वन्धी संचार माध्यमवाट (जस्तै रेडियो, टिभी, पत्रिका) सुन्ने, हेर्ने, पदने गरेको छ, छैन ।

children.name: media_prirty
children.hint: (टिभी, रेडियो, पत्रपत्रिका, पुस्तक, नमूना घर, अन्य)
children.label: भूकम्प प्रतिरोधी घर निर्माण सम्वन्धी संचार माध्यमवाट (जस्तै रेडियो, टिभी, पत्रिका) सुन्ने, हेर्ने, पदने गरेको छ भने मन परेको संचार माध्यम कुन हो ? प्राथमिकरण गर्नु होला ।
